channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Resilient OnPrem
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Resilient OnPrem

item.title: CVE-2021-29780|2024-08-03T22:18:03.059Z -- ibm -- resilient%20onprem
item.description: IBM Resilient OnPrem v41.1 of IBM Security SOAR could allow an authenticated user to perform actions that they should not have access to due to improper input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 203085.

item.title: CVE-2021-20527|2024-08-03T17:45:44.664Z -- ibm -- resilient%20onprem
item.description: IBM Resilient SOAR V38.0 could allow a privileged user to create create malicious scripts that could be executed as another user. IBM X-Force ID: 198759.
